section.name: Overview
section.p: Commons IO uses Maven or Ant as a build system.
You may also be interested in the upgrade notes.

section.name: Maven Goals
section.p: To build a jar file, change into IO's root directory and run "maven jar". The result will be in the "target" subdirectory.
To build the Javadocs, run "maven javadoc". The result will be in "target/docs/apidocs".
To build the full website, run "maven site". The result will be in "target/docs".

section.name: Ant Goals
section.p: To build a jar file, change into IO's root directory and run "ant jar". The result will be in the "build" subdirectory.
To build the Javadocs, run "ant javadoc". The result will be in "build/dist-build".
